Description:
General accountant - Fresh graduatesFinancial Record Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and general ledger entries.
Financial Reporting: Prepare timely and accurate financial statements, including balance sheets, income statements, and cash flow statements.
Journal Entries: Record and classify financial transactions by preparing journal entries, ensuring proper coding and documentation.
Month-End and Year-End Close: Assist in month-end and year-end closing procedures, including accruals, adjustments, and reporting.
Communication: Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to provide accurate financial information and support decision-making.Skills
Skills:
Education: Bachelor's degree in Accounting.
English language: Must be Proficient in the English language.
Accounting Knowledge: Strong understanding of generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) and financial reporting standards.
Detail-Oriented: Meticulous attention to detail and accuracy in financial data entry, analysis, and reporting.
Communication: Effective verbal and written communication skills to interact with colleagues and stakeholders.
Time Management: Excellent organizational skills to manage multiple tasks and meet deadlines.
Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills to identify and resolve discrepancies and issues.
Team Player: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and contribute to overall team goals.
Ethical Integrity: Maintain confidentiality and adhere to ethical accounting practices.
Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changes in regulations, technology, and processes.
Microsoft Excel: Proficiency in Excel for data analysis, pivot tables, and financial modeling.
Must be a fresh graduate or with less than a year of experience.
If you are a dedicated accounting professional with a passion for accuracy and financial integrity, we encourage you to apply and become a vital part of our finance team.
